Module org.example.proyecto
Package org.example.proyecto.gui

Class BookingListController

java.lang.Object
org.example.proyecto.gui.BookingListController
public class BookingListController extends Object
Controller class for managing the booking list view in the GUI. It handles the display, update, deletion, registration, and search of booking data.

    • BookingListController

      public BookingListController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller class. Sets up the table columns and loads the booking data. Adds a listener to handle selection changes in the booking table.

    • insertBooking

      public void insertBooking(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Registers a new booking with the data provided in the text fields. Validates the input data and shows alerts in case of missing information.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the event triggered by the button click.

    • updateBooking

      public void updateBooking(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Updates the selected booking with the data provided in the text fields. Validates the input data and shows alerts in case of missing information or no changes.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the event triggered by the button click.

    • deleteBooking

      public void deleteBooking(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Deletes the selected booking from the database. Shows an alert if no booking is selected.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the event triggered by the button click.

    • searchBooking

      public void searchBooking(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException, IOException
      Searches for bookings based on the data provided in the text fields. Displays the matching results in the booking table.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the event triggered by the button click.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.
      IOException - if an input/output error occurs.

    • selectClientForBooking

      public void selectClientForBooking(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Selects the client for booking. Opens the client list view and sets the necessary data for booking.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the event triggered by the button click.

    • selectHousingForBooking

      public void selectHousingForBooking(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Selects the housing for booking. Opens the housing list view (hotel or apartment) and sets the necessary data for booking.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the event triggered by the button click.

    • setApartmentForBooking

      public void setApartmentForBooking(TouristApartmentDTO apartmentForBooking)
      Sets the apartment for booking and updates the housing name field.
      Parameters:
      apartmentForBooking - the selected apartment for booking.

    • setHotelForBooking

      public void setHotelForBooking(HotelDTO selectedHotel)
      Sets the hotel for booking and updates the housing name field.
      Parameters:
      selectedHotel - the selected hotel for booking.

    • setTemplateComponent

      public void setTemplateComponent(javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane templateComponent)
      Sets the template component to be used in the view.
      Parameters:
      templateComponent - the template component.

    • setDataForBooking

      public void setDataForBooking(BookingDataHelper dataForBooking)
      Sets the data for booking and updates the corresponding fields.
      Parameters:
      dataForBooking - the data for booking.
